entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as blushing and having a rapt, misty-eyed expression while talking to Madame Maxime.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime is mentioned as emerging from her carriage with the Beauxbatons students.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is mentioned as a baby dragon that Hagrid had been looking at with a similar expression before.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as peering through the window to see what was happening.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as peering through the window with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as peering through the window with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: beauxbatons students
entities.description: The Beauxbatons students are mentioned as emerging from their carriage with Madame Maxime.

relationships.description: Hagrid is talking to Madame Maxime.
Harry is observing Hagrid talking to Madame Maxime.
